sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website.

sections.heading: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect your name, email address, phone number, shipping address, and payment details when you make a purchase or sign up for our services.

sections.heading: 3. Use of Information
sections.content: We use your information to fulfill orders, provide customer support, improve our services, and communicate relevant offers.

sections.heading: 4. Data Protection
sections.content: We implement secure systems and encryption to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

sections.heading: 5. Third-Party Services
sections.content: We may use trusted third-party services (e.g., payment gateways, logistics providers) who have their own privacy policies.

sections.heading: 6. Your Rights
sections.content: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us.

sections.heading: 7. Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this policy occasionally. The revised version will be posted on this page with a new effective date.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing our site or placing an order, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully before using our services.

sections.heading: 2. Product Information
sections.content: We strive for accuracy in product descriptions, pricing, and availability. We reserve the right to correct errors and update information.

sections.heading: 3. Orders and Payments
sections.content: Orders are considered confirmed once payment is received. We use secure payment gateways such as Razorpay.

sections.heading: 4. Shipping and Delivery
sections.content: Shipping timelines are estimates. We are not liable for delays caused by third-party logistics partners.

sections.heading: 5. Cancellations and Returns
sections.content: Please refer to our Return Policy page for details. Items must be returned in original condition within the return window.

sections.heading: 6. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages arising from the use of our platform.

sections.heading: 7. Governing Law
sections.content: These terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes shall be resolved in the jurisdiction of our registered office.
